page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area about to be described is an extremely varied and interesting one. The 12 square kilometres include every style of housing from{Victorian and {Edwardian terraces}to{semi-detached and{detached houses}of the twenties and thirties and from small and modest council owned accommodation to large and expensive private houses overlooking the River Thames or Bushy Park. Although essentially a{residential {area}there is a little industry, a great deal of{recreational open space and several areas of special interest. The{River Thames}flows through the area from west to east. Among the areas of special interest are{Hampton Court Palace, Bushy Park, {Hampton Water Works}and of course the {River Thames.
